alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 1:24AM MST until December 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with the higher amounts from Lead to Sundance. Much less snow can be expected in the Wyoming Black Hills to the west. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Black Hills and the Northern Foot Hills. In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
